name: MonsterMatchers.com
description:
Match monsters with their soul mates as a dating website profile matcher!

Every single monster has likes and dislikes. It's your job to match them up. You'll have to take note of a monsters likes and then look through the other monsters and carefully inspect their profile pictures to make sure they match up. For instance,  Smeezy the goblin might like creatures with Fangs so make sure to match it with a fanged monster, like a Varceline the vampire!

There is one catch... All the dating profiles are in an alien language! Through trial and error and some lucky guessing, you'll have to fill out your dictionary with words you learn to make sure you make the best matches!
